name: Doomsleigher
description:
This game was made for the Butterscotch ShenaniJam 2019

Doomsleigher is a small action packed flying shooter where you have to take down the creepy Halloween terrors before they get you! 

The achievements we did for this game was:

  • Tis the Season, not sure if it counts but we have winter season
  • Tango, our team size was 2.
  • Mozart, music AND SOUND was done by us.
